recipe_name: Pan fried trout with new potatoes and green beans
author: Paul Rankin
method: Bring a pan of water to the boil and boil the new potatoes for 8-10 minutes, or until tender, and the beans for 3-4 minutes. Drain. Gently heat the butter in a non-stick frying pan. Season the trout fillet and pan fry for 2-3 minutes on each side.  Transfer the trout to a serving plate. Spoon the new potatoes and beans alongside and drizzle with the melted butter to serve.
ingredients: 110g/4oz new potatoes,  110g/4oz French beans,  knob of butter,  2 trout fillets,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  55g/2oz unsalted butter, melted
